participant_1.background:
I have a family who supports my dreams of travel and photography.
i am a cashier at a grocery store.
I have amazing parents who support my every adventure.
i m in a jazz band and play the saxophone.
i m writing my first novel and hope to finish before the end of the year.

participant_2.background:
I remember my mom reading me books when I was little.
when i am not touring with the band , i like to garden.
i m 49 , male and live in dublin , ireland.
I'm always looking for ways to make my home cooking more exciting, and I love trying new recipes.
I enjoy a day of fishing on my viking boat.

content.text: Good afternoon!
Hello there!
How are you doing today?
Very well, thank you for asking! How about yourself?
I am doing well, thank you! I am a cashier at a grocery store.
Oh, that must be interesting. I am a musician, and I am also a gardener when I am not on tour.
That sounds really cool! What kind of music do you play?
I play the saxophone in a jazz band.
That sounds awesome! I am writing my first novel and I hope to finish it by the end of the year.
That is also really cool! I love to read books, and I used to write a lot when I was younger.
Oh, that is awesome! What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I especially enjoy historical fiction and fantasy novels.
I love historical fiction too! I think it is so interesting to learn about other cultures and time periods.
Yes, it is! I also enjoy learning about different cultures and time periods.
Oh, that is great! What are some of your favorite historical fiction novels?
I love the Outlander series by Diana Gabaldon, and I also really enjoyed the Pillars of the Earth series by Ken Follett.
I have heard great things about Outlander! I have not read it yet, but I am definitely going to check it out.
You should! It is a really great series.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! I am happy to help.
Hey, it was nice talking to you! I have to go now, but I hope we can chat again soon.
You too! It was nice talking to you. I hope we can chat again soon too
